attributes.action: Stop expanding Heathrow and move the London airport to an area where it can really expand without making the lives of Londoners a misery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To seriously consider new locations for a new London airport, even creating a man-made island perhaps.  Realise that in 50-60 years' time, this newly expanded Heathrow will be too small and will need to be expanded again.  How much more expansion of Heahrow can London take?  What about the people who live around.  More expansion means more flight routes and more flights and we will all go slowly insane.  Think of the future.
